text: Luis Andrés Caputo (Born, April 21, 1965) known as Toto Caputo, is an economist who serves as Minister of Economy of Argentina, since December 10, 2023, under the Presidency of Javier Milei. ==Biography== Born in 1965 in Buenos Aires, he is the cousin of Nicolás Caputo, a construction entrepreneur close to former president Mauricio Macri. He completed his primary and secondary education at Colegio La Salle in Buenos Aires. After studying at the University of Buenos Aires, he earned a bachelor's degree in economics. He was a professor of economics and finance in the postgraduate program at the Catholic University of Argentina. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Buenos Aires
title: Luis Caputo
